content.p: We know exercise is a great way to get you back to feeling your best, which is why we offer a series of promotional passes throughout the year. Our promotional passes are a great way to explore what our fantastic sports centres have to offer and to get active with University of Nottingham Sport! Try out our three fantastic sports centres with our 14-day pass - only Â£20! This trial pass is a great value way to explore what our sports centres have to offer and you can take advantage of our state-of-the-art facilities, including our pool, fitness classes and our fitness suites. The 14-day pass is on-sale from Friday 27 December and activated from Thursday 2 January. Work out in our state-of-the-art fitness suites Take a dip in our indoor pool at David Ross Sports Village Relax in our luxurious Health and Wellbeing Suite at David Ross Sports Village Scale new heights with our climbing wall at David Ross Sports Village Purchase your pass online using the links below
